transcription.text: Good morning, sir. Good morning, po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Hi, sir. This is Laura, financial officer ng IMG Collection. Regarding lang po ito sa Maya, kung may ka-sell.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Ma'am, alam mo lang signal mo. Napuputol ka.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Ayan po, sir. Okay na. Regarding lang po ito sa Maya, Maya Credit, sir.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Confirm ko lang, sir, kung kayo na po si John Emil, Paula Ramos.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Again, sir, this is Erica, financial officer ng IMG Collection. Calling on behalf of Maya Bank over the recorded line.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: For your account security, sir, please confirm the last four digits po ng mobile number
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: na na-register kay Maya is 0000. Tama po ba?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Pag-checking your... Maya Credit, sir, may outstanding balance na 11,445.68 centavos and one day na po kayong overdue. Ano po ba naging reason, sir, bakit nadalay po ng payment?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Okay. Pero in terms of the reason, the reason why, kasi, kailangan niyo ba malaman? Or can I just simply tell yung,
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Ano lang, sir, para may note po dito?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: can I just simply tell yung interest?
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Hindi kasi may note lang nila. Ano po ba?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Hindi naman. Hindi lang kulang siya talaga priority kasi technically
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: nagamit yung fund naka-auto-deduct kasi. Pero, I'll pay. Normally naman, nababayaran mo yan.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Apo, apo. Within na day naman, sir, mababayaran po.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Hindi. Hindi, hindi today. Weekend today eh.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Ah, bali... Ah, kailan po natin siya maisasettle, sir?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Ah, next week po ba siya? Ay, hindi po ba siya kaya magawansa ng paraan, sir? Asible for a loan din naman po yung account?
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Ah, hindi. Hindi, hindi ngayon eh. Hindi. Kasi also, meron pa akong request sa mga eh before na wag akong tawakan before today. Hindi pa rin nilinagaw eh. Tumatawag pa rin sila every now and then.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Naito transfer po kasi sa amin yung account niya, sir. Gawa nga po ng overdue. So, expect naman po talaga na may tatawag po kasi ito i-remind po sa inyo.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: I-remind lang naman po. Bale, hindi po siya maisasettle. So, day, sir. Next week pa, sir.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: Hindi, hindi siya ma-install. By next week pa.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Oh, okay. Bale, mga anong araw kaya yun, sir? Para may note na lang po dito sa account ninyo.
transcription.speaker: spk2

transcription.text: kung anong oras papasok yung saldo eh. Siguro, ano to pa? Siguro Wednesday o Thursday.
transcription.speaker: spk1

transcription.text: Ah, Wednesday or Thursday pa. Sige, sir. Inote na lang po dito.
transcription.speaker: spk2

translation.tagalog: Good morning, sir. Good morning, po.
translation.english: Good morning, sir. Good morning, sir.

translation.tagalog: Hi, sir. This is Laura, financial officer ng IMG Collection. Regarding lang po ito sa Maya, kung may ka-sell.
translation.english: Hi, sir. This is Laura, financial officer of IMG Collection. This is just regarding Maya, if you have a concern.

translation.tagalog: Ma'am, alam mo lang signal mo. Napuputol ka.
translation.english: Ma'am, your signal is weak. You're cutting out.

translation.tagalog: Ayan po, sir. Okay na. Regarding lang po ito sa Maya, Maya Credit, sir.
translation.english: There sir, it's okay now. This is just regarding Maya, Maya Credit, sir.

translation.tagalog: Confirm ko lang, sir, kung kayo na po si John Emil, Paula Ramos.
translation.english: Just confirming, sir, are you John Emil Paula Ramos?

translation.tagalog: Again, sir, this is Erica, financial officer ng IMG Collection. Calling on behalf of Maya Bank over the recorded line.
translation.english: Again sir, this is Erica, financial officer of IMG Collection, calling on behalf of Maya Bank over the recorded line.

translation.tagalog: For your account security, sir, please confirm the last four digits po ng mobile number
translation.english: For your account security, sir, please confirm the last four digits of the mobile number

translation.tagalog: na na-register kay Maya is 0000. Tama po ba?
translation.english: that is registered with Maya is 0000. Is that correct?

translation.tagalog: Pag-checking your... Maya Credit, sir, may outstanding balance na 11,445.68 centavos and one day na po kayong overdue. Ano po ba naging reason, sir, bakit nadalay po ng payment?
translation.english: Upon checking your Maya Credit, sir, you have an outstanding balance of 11,445.68 and you are overdue by one day. What was the reason for the payment delay?

translation.tagalog: Okay. Pero in terms of the reason, the reason why, kasi, kailangan niyo ba malaman? Or can I just simply tell yung,
translation.english: Okay. But in terms of the reason, do you really need to know? Or can I just say...
Just, sir, so we can put a note here.

translation.tagalog: Ano lang, sir, para may note po dito?
translation.english: Can I just say it’s interest?

translation.tagalog: can I just simply tell yung interest?
translation.english: It’s just so they can note it. What is it?

translation.tagalog: Hindi kasi may note lang nila. Ano po ba?

translation.english: No, it just wasn’t a priority because technically,

translation.tagalog: Hindi naman. Hindi lang kulang siya talaga priority kasi technically

translation.english: the fund got used. It’s on auto-deduct. But I’ll pay. I normally do pay it.

translation.tagalog: nagamit yung fund naka-auto-deduct kasi. Pero, I'll pay. Normally naman, nababayaran mo yan.
translation.english: Yes, yes. It will be paid within the day, sir?

translation.tagalog: Apo, apo. Within na day naman, sir, mababayaran po.
translation.english: No. Not today. It's the weekend.

translation.tagalog: Hindi. Hindi, hindi today. Weekend today eh.
translation.english: Ah, so... When can we expect it to be settled, sir?

translation.tagalog: Ah, bali... Ah, kailan po natin siya maisasettle, sir?

translation.english: Ah, next week? Isn’t there a way to settle it now, sir? Since it's also for a loan account?

translation.tagalog: Ah, next week po ba siya? Ay, hindi po ba siya kaya magawansa ng paraan, sir? Asible for a loan din naman po yung account?
translation.english: Ah, no. Not now. Also, I requested previously that I not be contacted before today, but they still kept calling.

translation.tagalog: Ah, hindi. Hindi, hindi ngayon eh. Hindi. Kasi also, meron pa akong request sa mga eh before na wag akong tawakan before today. Hindi pa rin nilinagaw eh. Tumatawag pa rin sila every now and then.

translation.english: The account was transferred to us, sir, due to overdue status. So it’s expected that someone will call to remind you.

translation.tagalog: Naito transfer po kasi sa amin yung account niya, sir. Gawa nga po ng overdue. So, expect naman po talaga na may tatawag po kasi ito i-remind po sa inyo.

translation.english: It’s just a reminder, sir. So it won’t be settled today? Next week then, sir?

translation.tagalog: I-remind lang naman po. Bale, hindi po siya maisasettle. So, day, sir. Next week pa, sir.
Hindi, hindi siya ma-install. By next week pa.
translation.english: Okay, sir. Around what day next week? Just so we can note it on your account.

translation.tagalog: Oh, okay. Bale, mga anong araw kaya yun, sir? Para may note na lang po dito sa account ninyo.

translation.english: What time the salary will come in. Maybe Wednesday or Thursday.
Ah, Wednesday or Thursday. Alright, sir. I’ll note it here.

translation.tagalog: kung anong oras papasok yung saldo eh. Siguro, ano to pa? Siguro Wednesday o Thursday.
Ah, Wednesday or Thursday pa. Sige, sir. Inote na lang po dito.
